title: Episode 1 – When Silence Spoke
content: It started on a rainy Maseno morning.
The ink on my desk had dried, but the memories hadn’t.
I told myself — maybe words can heal after all.

title: Episode 2 – Letters I Never Sent
content: She left a note on the bus seat.
No name, no number. Just emotions folded inside paper.
My pen cried again that night.
